Bio.title: 30 years of science, a lifetime of resilience
Bio.intro: For three decades, my life was dedicated to accompanying the miracle of birth as an OB-GYN. Bringing thousands of lives into the world taught me that women's health is a path of constant evolution, and that well-being should not stop upon reaching maturity.
Bio.personal_story: My path was not linear. As a multi-time breast cancer survivor, I experienced firsthand the fear, uncertainty, and profound impact that hormonal changes have on our identity and energy. I understood that surviving is only the first step; the true goal is to regain fulfillment and feel in control of our bodies again.
Bio.method_desc: Today, my practice focuses on Longevity Medicine and Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT). I do not believe in standard solutions. Each patient receives what I call a 'bespoke treatment': a strategically designed plan based on profound clinical analysis. We combine high-quality hormones with specific pharmaceuticals to ensure each organism receives exactly what it needs to balance safely and effectively.
Bio.promise: My purpose is to help you rediscover your vitality. Hormonal balance not only improves energy, libido, and sleep quality; it is an investment in your cardiovascular, bone, and cognitive health for the years ahead. Whether in Argentina or Brazil, my commitment is to accompany you through your most powerful stage with science, safety, and empathy.

Faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faqs.description: Clear your doubts about HRT and the path to your well-being.

what_is_trh.question: What exactly is HRT and the famous 'Chip'?
what_is_trh.answer: HRT consists of restoring hormonal levels that decrease with age. The 'chip' or pellet is a small implant that releases these hormones constantly for 6 to 9 months.

is_bioidentical.question: Are all hormones 'bioidentical'?
is_bioidentical.answer: Not necessarily. We design a 'bespoke treatment' that may combine bioidentical hormones with specific pharmaceuticals to optimize your metabolism based on your test results.

benefits.question: What real benefits can I expect?
benefits.answer: Patients report profound improvements in energy, libido, and sleep quality, along with long-term cardiovascular and bone protection.

cancer_history.question: I have a history of cancer, can I undergo treatment?
cancer_history.answer: As a survivor and specialist, Dr. Silvia evaluates each case with rigorous oncological criteria. Under expert supervision, HRT can be a safe option to reclaim your quality of life.

procedure.question: What is the placement procedure like?
procedure.answer: It is an in-office procedure taking less than 15 minutes with local anesthesia. It requires no stitches, and you can resume normal activities almost immediately.

why_labs.question: Why do I need prior lab analysis?
why_labs.answer: Labs are the scientific map that allows us to define your exact dosage. We don't install a standard product; we balance your system safely based on your bloodwork.

section1.title: 1. Ethical Commitment & Confidentiality
section1.content: For Dr. Silvia Vildoza, the privacy of your health assets is a non-negotiable pillar of medical practice. Sensitive health data collected for the clinical evaluation of Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT) is managed under the highest standards of bioethics, ensuring professional secrecy and absolute respect for your privacy.

section2.title: 2. Data Asset Management
section2.content: To design a surgically precise and personalized longevity protocol, we process the following information:

items.personal: Biographical Identification: Full name and direct contact channels (WhatsApp and Email) for care coordination.
items.medical: Evolutionary Medical Context: Gynecological history, current symptoms, and relevant clinical history for hormonal balance.
items.files: Diagnostic Evidence: Lab analysis and complementary studies securely uploaded to our platform.

section3.title: 3. Security & Technology Infrastructure
section3.content: Your information resides in a cutting-edge infrastructure designed for medical data protection. We use encrypted storage via Supabase and optimized deployment through Vercel. We implement restricted access security policies (RLS) ensuring only authorized clinical personnel can interact with your sensitive records.

section4.title: 4. Rights of the Data Subject
section4.content: You retain sovereignty over your information at all times. You may exercise your rights to access, rectification, portability, or revocation of consent, requesting the definitive removal of your records from our active database when deemed appropriate.

contact.title: Privacy Care Center
contact.description: If you wish to exercise your rights or require clarification on how we handle your medical information, our official WhatsApp channel is available for direct and personalized management.

general.title: 1. Scope of Boutique Medicine
general.content: Medical services provided by Dr. Silvia Vildoza include high-level consultancy, integral diagnosis, and evolutionary follow-up of Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT). This platform is the gateway to 'bespoke' medicine based on longevity science and the optimization of hormonal well-being.

appointments.title: 2. Digital Consultations & Cancellation Protocol
appointments.content: Clinical sessions are conducted via Google Meet, ensuring a professional telemedicine environment. Due to the exclusivity of each slot, appointments must be rescheduled with a minimum of 48 hours' notice. No-shows without prior notice or cancellations outside this period are non-refundable, recognizing the professional time reserved for your personalized care.

medical.title: 3. Responsibility & Clinical Rigor
medical.content: Excellence in treatment depends on diagnostic precision. Presentation of requested lab analysis is a mandatory condition before any prescription. The truthfulness and completeness of the information declared in the application form are the sole responsibility of the patient, being fundamental to ensuring the clinical safety of the process.

footer_note.title: Consent for Care
footer_note.description: By proceeding with your application and scheduling, you declare understanding that HRT is a dynamic balance process requiring your active commitment, strict compliance with indicated protocols, and attendance at periodic check-ups to ensure optimal results for your health.
